nodes.bodyText: Any reason you are using the full name for these and not just using the relative name or a static import?
Ah sorry, this is, while useful, unrelated. Should back it out and add in a separate commit.

Since these all use an href of #, clicking any of them jumps you to the top of the page, which doesn't work all that well when using them (since it can scroll the current result of the page) Adding an anchor element, e.g. just above the button elements, and changing each href="#" to href="#style-editor" should make this work a bit better.
